City Administrator’s Office
===========================



### City Administrator

Pablo Rodriguez
---------------

“The City Administrator’s office is committed to effective governance, fiscal responsibility, and ensuring quality services that enhance the well-being of our community."

[Reach Out ->](https://presidiotx.us/?page_id=17)
